Class SmugglersCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.cards.cards_objects.Card
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.cards.cards_objects.SmugglersCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SmugglersCard extends Card
The SmugglersCard class represents an "Smugglers" card in the game. This card specifies a fire power needed to win the battle against smugglers, a cargo penalty in case of loss, a list of cargo rewards and a number of flight days reduction in case of win. It extends the abstract class Card and implements the specific properties of this card type.

  • Constructor Details

    • SmugglersCard

      public SmugglersCard(int level, String image, int firePowerNeeded, int cargoPenalty, List<CargoColor> rewards, int flightDaysReduction)
      Constructor to create a new "Smugglers" card.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of the card.
      image - the image of the ship.
      firePowerNeeded - the number of fire power needed to win the battle.
      cargoPenalty - the number of cargo penalty in case of lost.
      rewards - the list of cargos rewarded in case of win.
      flightDaysReduction - the number of flight days to reduce.

      public boolean applyEffect(GameModel gameModel)
      Description copied from class: Card
      Applies the specific effect of the card to the provided game model. Each card type should define its unique behavior when this method is invoked.
